#summary Delphi IDE Colorizer (DIC) Features

= Introduction =

 The Delphi IDE Colorizer (DIC) is a RAD Studio Wizard which allows to customize the look and feel of the visible *workspace* of the IDE, this plugin change the appearance of the menus, docked windows, scrollbars and others controls.
